question: How many non-executive chairpersons are appointed by the Finance ministry recently?
explanation: Finance ministry has appointed non-executive chairpersons at Punjab & Sindh Bank, Dena Bank & Central Bank of India, as part of its agenda to reform public sector banks. Charan Singh, Anjali Bansal & Tapan Ray were appointed as non executive chairperson of Punjab & Sind Bank, Dena Bank & Central Bank of India, respectively. These banks have been plagued by mounting bad loans & massive losses.
